headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by TikTok creators. Use /tt_user/oauth2/token/ or /tt_user/oauth2/refresh_token/ endpoint to get or renew an access token.

parameters.name: creator_id
parameters.description: Application specific unique ID of the TikTok account. Pass the value of the open_id field returned in the response of /tt_user/oauth2/token/ or /tt_user/oauth2/refresh_token/ to this field.

parameters.name: video_ids
parameters.description: The IDs of the videos to retrieve information for. If video_ids is provided, limit and cursor will be ignored.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of videos that you want to retrieve per request. Value range: 1-10. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Timestamp cursor. The videos before the timestamp value in milliseconds will be returned in reverse-chronological order. By default, the value is 0 and the most recent videos will be returned.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: posts
fields.description: List of posts within the creator's TikTok account.

fields.name: display_name
fields.description: The display name (nickname) for the creator.

fields.name: thumbnail_url
fields.description: Temporary URL for profile photo of the creator. The expiration time is included in the URL after the x-expires parameter, in the format of an Epoch/Unix timestamp in seconds. Validity period: around 7 days.

fields.name: embed_url
fields.description: An embeddable link for this TikTok video. This URL can be used to embed the TikTok video in external websites or applications.

fields.name: likes
fields.description: Likes. Total number of likes on the video.

fields.name: comments
fields.description: Comments. Total number of comments on the video.

fields.name: shares
fields.description: Shares. Total number of times the video has been shared.

fields.name: video_views
fields.description: Video views. The number of times viewers watched your video.

fields.name: favorites
fields.description: Favorites. The total number of times the video has been added to favorites.

fields.name: create_time
fields.description: The time when the video was created, in the format of an Epoch/Unix timestamp in milliseconds. Example: 1749206540000 .

fields.name: has_more
fields.description: Whether an additional page of data is available. Supported values: true , false .

fields.name: cursor
fields.description: Timestamp cursor. The time value of the last item returned in milliseconds according to the current request. You need to use this cursor value in your subsequent request to get the remaining videos.
